00001 // CaenVMEUpgrade.c : Defines the entry point for the console application.
00002 //
00003 // 06/06/06 - Cambiato l'ordine dei parametri della Init. Link e BdNum erano
00004 //            invertiti quindi non funzionava l'upgrade con piu' di una A2818.
00005

00024 // Define FIRMWARE regions into flash by using their start address (116-bit word address)
00025 #define FIRST_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS    0x000000
00026 #define SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS   0x200000
00027 #define THIRD_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS    0x400000
00028 #define FOURTH_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS   0x600000
00029 
00030 
00031 /* get time in milliseconds */
00032 static long get_time()
00033 {
00034 long time_ms;
00035 
00036 #ifdef WIN32
00037     struct _timeb timebuffer;
00038 
00039     _ftime( &timebuffer );
00040     time_ms = (long)timebuffer.time * 1000 + (long)timebuffer.millitm;
00041 #else
00042     struct timeval t1;
00043     struct timezone tz;
00044 
00045     gettimeofday(&t1, &tz);
00046     time_ms = (t1.tv_sec) * 1000 + t1.tv_usec / 1000;
00047 #endif
00048 
00049     return time_ms;
00050 }
00051 
00052 int A3818UpgradeFromFile(int32_t A3818_handle, FILE * binfile, int fwcopy, A3818Upgrade_Mode mode) {
00053   
00054         uint32_t baseAddress;
00055         long currentTime, elapsedTime;        
00056         int finish;
00057         unsigned char c, c1;
00058         uint32_t      bp;        
00059         uint32_t      bufferLength;      
00060 
00061         uint32_t      *buffer;
00062         unsigned int  verifyErrors = 0;
00063         buffer = malloc(BITSTREAM_BYTES * sizeof(uint32_t));
00064         switch(fwcopy) {
00065           case 0 :
00066              baseAddress =  FIRST_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00067              break;
00068           case 1 :
00069              baseAddress =  SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00070              break;
00071           case 2 :
00072              baseAddress =  THIRD_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00073              break;
00074           case 3 :
00075              baseAddress =  FOURTH_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00076              break;
00077           default :
00078              baseAddress =  SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;     
00079              break;
00080                   
00081         }
00082         
00083         bp = 0;
00084         finish = 0;
00085         
00086         // Carica il bitsream in un buffer di memoria
00087         currentTime = get_time();  
00088         while( !finish ) {
00089                
00090            c = (unsigned char)fgetc(binfile);  // read one byte from file
00091            c1 = (unsigned char)fgetc(binfile);  // read one byte from file (Strataflash a 16 bit)
00092       
00093 #ifdef __SWAP__                
00094            swap = 0;
00095                 
00096            // Swap primo byte
00097            for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00098              if( c & (1 << i) )
00099                 swap = swap | (0x80 >> i);
00100                 
00101            swap1 = 0;        
00102            // Swap secondo byte        
00103            for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00104              if( c1 & (1 << i) )
00105                swap1 = swap1 | (0x80 >> i);
00106                        
00107            buffer[bp] = (uint32_t) ((swap1 <<8) | swap); // HACK : swap o non swap?
00108 #else               
00109            buffer[bp] = (uint32_t) ((c1 <<8) | c);
00110 #endif // __SWAP__   
00111 
00112            bp++;
00113            if( feof(binfile) )
00114              finish = 1;
00115         }  // end of while loop     
00116 
00117         bufferLength = (--bp);
00118         
00119         if ((bufferLength*2) != BITSTREAM_BYTES) {
00120            printf("\nERROR: Input BIN file length (%d bytes) is different than expected bitstream size (%d bytes). Exiting.....\n", bufferLength*2, BITSTREAM_BYTES);
00121            free(buffer);
00122            return -1;
00123         }
00124         
00125         elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00126         printf("\nBitstream (%d bytes) loaded in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength*2, elapsedTime);
00127         
00128         A3818_EnableBPIAccess(A3818_handle);     
00129 
00130         /* Cancellazione della zona di flash riservata al firmware */
00131         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ||
00132              (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_ERASE_ONLY) ) {
00133             printf("Erasing flash ");
00134             fflush(stdout);            
00135             currentTime = get_time();         
00136             eraseFirmware(A3818_handle, baseAddress, fwcopy);
00137             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00138             printf("\nFlash erased in %ld milliseconds\n", elapsedTime);
00139         }
00140         
00141         /* Programmazione immagine firmware in flash */
00142         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ) {
00143             currentTime = get_time();      
00144             writeFlash(A3818_handle, buffer, bufferLength, baseAddress);
00145             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00146             printf("\n%d 16-bit words programmed in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength, elapsedTime);
00147         }
00148             
00149         /* Verifica immagine firmware in flash */
00150         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ||
00151              (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_VERIFY_ONLY) ) {
00152             currentTime = get_time();        
00153             verifyErrors = verifyFlash(A3818_handle, buffer, bufferLength, baseAddress);
00154             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00155             printf("\n%d 16-bit words verified in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength, elapsedTime);
00156         }
00157         
00158         A3818_EnableSPIAccess(A3818_handle);      
00159         
00160 
00161         if( verifyErrors > 0 ) {
00162                 printf("\n\n%d errors found during verify!\n",verifyErrors);
00163         } else {
00164                 printf("\n\nFirmware updated without errors. Written %d words\n",bufferLength);
00165         }
00166         free(buffer);
00167         return 0;
00168 }
00169

00171 int A3818UpgradeFromMem(int32_t A3818_handle, char* fwdata, int fwsize, int fwcopy, A3818Upgrade_Mode mode) {
00172                 int fi = 0;
00173         uint32_t baseAddress;
00174         long currentTime, elapsedTime;        
00175         int finish;
00176         unsigned char c, c1;
00177         uint32_t      bp;        
00178         uint32_t      bufferLength;      
00179 
00180         uint32_t      *buffer;
00181         unsigned int  verifyErrors = 0;
00182         buffer = malloc(BITSTREAM_BYTES * sizeof(uint32_t));
00183         switch(fwcopy) {
00184           case 0 :
00185              baseAddress =  FIRST_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00186              break;
00187           case 1 :
00188              baseAddress =  SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00189              break;
00190           case 2 :
00191              baseAddress =  THIRD_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00192              break;
00193           case 3 :
00194              baseAddress =  FOURTH_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;
00195              break;
00196           default :
00197              baseAddress =  SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS;     
00198              break;
00199                   
00200         }
00201         
00202         bp = 0;
00203         finish = 0;
00204         
00205         // Carica il bitsream in un buffer di memoria
00206         currentTime = get_time();  
00207         while( !finish ) {
00208                
00209            c = (unsigned char)fwdata[fi++];  // read one byte from file
00210            c1 = (unsigned char)fwdata[fi++];  // read one byte from file (Strataflash a 16 bit)
00211       
00212 #ifdef __SWAP__                
00213            swap = 0;
00214                 
00215            // Swap primo byte
00216            for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00217              if( c & (1 << i) )
00218                 swap = swap | (0x80 >> i);
00219                 
00220            swap1 = 0;        
00221            // Swap secondo byte        
00222            for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00223              if( c1 & (1 << i) )
00224                swap1 = swap1 | (0x80 >> i);
00225                        
00226            buffer[bp] = (uint32_t) ((swap1 <<8) | swap); // HACK : swap o non swap?
00227 #else               
00228            buffer[bp] = (uint32_t) ((c1 <<8) | c);
00229 #endif // __SWAP__   
00230 
00231            bp++;
00232            if( fi >= fwsize )
00233              finish = 1;
00234         }  // end of while loop     
00235 
00236         bufferLength = (--bp);
00237         
00238         if ((bufferLength*2) != BITSTREAM_BYTES) {
00239            printf("\nERROR: Input BIN file length (%d bytes) is different than expected bitstream size (%d bytes). Exiting.....\n", bufferLength*2, BITSTREAM_BYTES);
00240            free(buffer);
00241            return -1;
00242         }
00243         
00244         elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00245         printf("\nBitstream (%d bytes) loaded in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength*2, elapsedTime);
00246         
00247         A3818_EnableBPIAccess(A3818_handle);     
00248 
00249         /* Cancellazione della zona di flash riservata al firmware */
00250         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ||
00251              (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_ERASE_ONLY) ) {
00252             printf("Erasing flash ");
00253             fflush(stdout);            
00254             currentTime = get_time();         
00255             eraseFirmware(A3818_handle, baseAddress, fwcopy);
00256             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00257             printf("\nFlash erased in %ld milliseconds\n", elapsedTime);
00258         }
00259         
00260         /* Programmazione immagine firmware in flash */
00261         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ) {
00262             currentTime = get_time();      
00263             writeFlash(A3818_handle, buffer, bufferLength, baseAddress);
00264             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00265             printf("\n%d 16-bit words programmed in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength, elapsedTime);
00266         }
00267             
00268         /* Verifica immagine firmware in flash */
00269         if ( (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_FULL      ) ||
00270              (mode == A3818_UPGRADE_VERIFY_ONLY) ) {
00271             currentTime = get_time();        
00272             verifyErrors = verifyFlash(A3818_handle, buffer, bufferLength, baseAddress);
00273             elapsedTime = get_time() - currentTime;
00274             printf("\n%d 16-bit words verified in %ld milliseconds\n", bufferLength, elapsedTime);
00275         }
00276         
00277         A3818_EnableSPIAccess(A3818_handle);      
00278         
00279 
00280         if( verifyErrors > 0 ) {
00281                 printf("\n\n%d errors found during verify!\n",verifyErrors);
00282         } else {
00283                 printf("\n\nFirmware updated without errors. Written %d words\n",bufferLength);
00284         }
00285         free(buffer);
00286         return 0;
00287 }
